item.title: Git Notes
item.description: Git is a distributed version control system. Every dev has a working copy of the code and full change history on their local machine, by Linus Torvalds. Here is a git cheat sheet for everyday life. Will update this in future… [bash gutter=“false”] git init transform the current directory into a Git repository. This adds a .git folder to the current directory and makes it possible to start recording revisions git config –global user.
